com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.controls

Class DashboardObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject
      • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.HasListeners
        • com.googlecode.gwt.charts.client.controls.DashboardObject

  • public class DashboardObject
extends HasListeners
    Represents a collection of collaborating controls and charts that share the same underlying data.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Modifier Constructor and Description
      protected DashboardObject() 

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      DashboardObject bind(ControlWrapperObject<?,?> controlWrapper, ChartWrapperObject<?> chartWrapper)
      Binds one Control to a dashboard participant (either a chart or other control), so that all of the latter are redrawn whenever any of the former collects a programmatic or user interaction that affects the data managed by the dashboard.
      DashboardObject bind(com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArray<ControlWrapperObject<?,?>> controlWrappers, com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArray<ChartWrapperObject<?>> chartWrappers)
      Binds one or more Controls to one or more other dashboard participants (either charts or other controls), so that all of the latter are redrawn whenever any of the former collects a programmatic or user interaction that affects the data managed by the dashboard.
      static DashboardObject create(com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element container)
      Creates a new DashboardObject.
      void draw(DataSource dataSource)
      Draws the dashboard.
      void draw(com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArrayMixed dataArray)
      Draws the dashboard.
      void draw(String json)
      Draws the dashboard.

        addListener, addListener, removeAllListeners, removeListener, trigger

      • Methods inherited from class com.google.gwt.core.client.JavaScriptObject

        cast, createArray, createArray, createFunction, createObject, equals, hashCode, toSource, toString

    • Method Detail

      • create

        public static DashboardObject create(com.google.gwt.dom.client.Element container)
        Creates a new DashboardObject.
        Parameters:
        container - A reference to a valid container element on the page that will hold the dashboard contents.
        Returns:
        a new DashboardObject

      • bind

        public final DashboardObject bind(ControlWrapperObject<?,?> controlWrapper,
                   ChartWrapperObject<?> chartWrapper)
        Binds one Control to a dashboard participant (either a chart or other control), so that all of the latter are redrawn whenever any of the former collects a programmatic or user interaction that affects the data managed by the dashboard.
        Parameters:
        controlWrapper -
        chartWrapper -
        Returns:
        the dashboard instance itself for chaining multiple bind() calls together.

      • bind

        public final DashboardObject bind(com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArray<ControlWrapperObject<?,?>> controlWrappers,
                   com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArray<ChartWrapperObject<?>> chartWrappers)
        Binds one or more Controls to one or more other dashboard participants (either charts or other controls), so that all of the latter are redrawn whenever any of the former collects a programmatic or user interaction that affects the data managed by the dashboard. Returns the dashboard instance itself for chaining multiple bind() calls together.
        Parameters:
        controlWrappers -
        chartWrappers -
        Returns:
        the dashboard instance itself for chaining multiple bind() calls together.

      • draw

        public final void draw(DataSource dataSource)
        Draws the dashboard.
        Parameters:
        dataSource - a DataTable or a DataView object

      • draw

        public final void draw(com.google.gwt.core.client.JsArrayMixed dataArray)
        Draws the dashboard.
        Parameters:
        dataArray - an array following the syntax of ChartHelper.arrayToDataTable(JsArrayMixed)

      • draw

        public final void draw(String json)
        Draws the dashboard.
        Parameters:
        json - a JSON representation of a DataTable
